---
title: "Toronto Shelter Data in 2020"
description: |
  An examination of overall occupancy trends in Toronto shelters in 2020.
site: distill::distill_website
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(opendatatoronto)
library(distill)
library(bsselectR)

```

```{r reading rds plots from shelter-data, echo = FALSE}
#will assign the rds files to an R object to read them here
overview <- read_rds("overview.rds")
m1e <- read_rds("m1e.rds")
```
 
```{r save images, echo = FALSE}
ggsave("images/overview.png", overview)
ggsave("images/m1e.png", m1e)
```

```{r making vectors of the images, echo = FALSE}
plots <- c(Overview = "images/overview.png",
           M1E = "images/m1e.png")
```

```{r use bsselect}
bsselect(plots, type = "img", selected = "Overview", show_tick = TRUE, live_search = TRUE)
```
